title: Airlines cancel hundreds of flights after U.S., Israeli attacks on Iran
summary_full: Airlines canceled more than 1,800 flights in and out of Middle East countries on Saturday, according to aviation data firm Cirium.
summary_public: Airlines canceled more than 1,800 flights in and out of Middle East countries on Saturday, according to aviation data firm Cirium.

IR.label: negative
